title: Curried Chicken Wraps
nutrition_tip: You can use curry powder in a variety of recipes. In this recipe, it adds a…

ingredients.name: chicken (boneless, skinless, cooked, 1/4" diced; or 6 ounces)
apples (fresh, unpeeled, 1/4" diced; gently wash apples under running water before cutting)
tortillas (whole-wheat; 8" across, at least 42 grams or 1 1/2 ounces each)

steps.text: Wash hands with soap and water for at least 20 seconds.
In a medium bowl, combine yogurt and curry powder. Stir until well-blended.
Using a rubber spatula, fold in chicken, apples, and raisins (see notes).
Place ½ cup chicken salad in the center of each tortilla. Fold each side of tortilla in, then roll up.
Place seam-side down on a cutting board and cut in half.
